com.vectorprint.report.itext.style.stylers

Class Image<DATATYPE>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vectorprint.configuration.parameters.ParameterizableImpl
      • com.vectorprint.report.itext.style.stylers.AbstractStyler
        • com.vectorprint.report.itext.style.stylers.AdvancedImpl<DATATYPE>
          • com.vectorprint.report.itext.style.stylers.AbstractPositioning<DATATYPE>
            • com.vectorprint.report.itext.style.stylers.Image<DATATYPE>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.itextpdf.text.pdf.PdfPCellEvent, com.itextpdf.text.pdf.PdfPTableEvent, com.vectorprint.configuration.parameters.Parameterizable, DocumentAware, ImageLoaderAware, LayerManagerAware, BaseStyler, Advanced<DATATYPE>, Cloneable, Observer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Barcode, ImportTiff

    public class Image<DATATYPE>
extends AbstractPositioning<DATATYPE>
implements ImageLoaderAware
    Class for adding images (pdf (first page), tiff (first page) or other formats supported by the default awt toolkit) to a report. Adding can be done through setup, BaseReportGenerator.createAndAddElement(java.lang.Object, java.lang.Class, java.lang.String[]) and style(java.lang.Object, java.lang.Object), or by AbstractPositioning.draw(com.itextpdf.text.Rectangle, java.lang.String). This class initializes an image by retrieving data from the URL parameter, or by trying to construct an URL from data.
    Author:
    Eduard Drenth at VectorPrint.nl
